statements: ALTER TABLE accounts ADD COLUMN email VARCHAR(100);
ALTER TABLE transactions ADD COLUMN description TEXT;
ALTER TABLE accounts ALTER COLUMN balance SET DEFAULT 0.00;
ALTER TABLE Accounts ADD COLUMN email TEXT
ALTER TABLE Transactions ADD COLUMN date DATE
ALTER TABLE Users ADD COLUMN created_at TIMESTAMP
ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN address VARCHAR(100)
ALTER TABLE transactions ADD COLUMN description TEXT
ALTER TABLE accounts ADD COLUMN currency VARCHAR(10)
ALTER TABLE account ADD COLUMN account_balance FLOAT
ALTER TABLE account DROP COLUMN account_name
ALTER TABLE account MODIFY COLUMN account_id BIGINT
